div.p: I work 9:00-5:00, I’ll sort of come in, switch on my computer, check my emails and see what’s come through, what I need to action
and then in the afternoon we open up a drop-in because we have a lot of visitors come in so it’s greeting them, taking down their details and things;
in the morning you tend to get on with more of your own work like paying invoices and things like that so yeah the afternoon tends to be a bit more chilled.
